alert.note: Alert for Coastal Broward County; Coastal Palm Beach County; Inland Broward County; Inland Palm Beach County; Metro Broward County; Metro Palm Beach County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 13 at 1:11PM EST by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A gusty shower will impact portions of Broward and southeastern Palm Beach Counties through 145 PM EST... At 110 PM EST, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a gusty shower near Sawgrass Mills Mall, or near Sunrise, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Fort Lauderdale, Pembroke Pines, Hollywood, Coral Springs, Pompano Beach, Davie, Plantation, Sunrise, Boca Raton, Deerfield Beach, Tamarac, Margate, Lighthouse Point, Lauderdale-By-The-Sea, Highland Beach, Lauderhill, Weston, Coconut Creek, Oakland Park and North Lauderdale. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.
